mapper.select: select mf.firm_id as id, mf.firm_info as about, sc.company_name as company_name, sc.company_address as company_address, sc.company_person as company_person, sc.company_email as company_email, sc.company_fax as company_fax, sc.company_phone as company_phone, sc.company_site as company_site, sc.company_trade as company_trade, mf.create_name as createName, mf.create_time as createTime, mf.update_time as updateTime, mf.update_name as updateName from ws_mt_firminfo mf left join ws_user_firm uf on mf.firm_id = uf.firm_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_company AS suc ON suc.user_id =uf.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_company AS sc ON sc.company_id=suc.company_id where uf.user_id=#{userid} and del_status=1
mapper.update: update ws_mt_firminfo set Del_status=0 where firm_id=#{id};
